Detailed Description

Handles Requests using a PacketResendHandler.

ServerTypes::servertype_t  serverType

Handles a set of outstanding requests.

Has one thread.

RequestContainer* RequestHandler::checkDoneRequest (   )  [private]
 

Checks for done requests and returns the first, might return NULL.

Monitor function.

Returns:
Done request, or NULL if not done requests.

RequestContainer* RequestHandler::getAnswer (   ) 
 

Returns a answer, waits if no answer available.

Use notifyAnswer to release threads waiting here. AnswerMonitor function.

Returns:
a answer, or NULL if notified.

Referenced by GenericServer::getAnswer().
